name: 彭馨儀
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1	9/13	Introduction & Level Test

Week 2	9/20	Reading 1: Unit 1 & 2
Week 3	9/27	Reading 1: Unit 3 & 4
Week 4	10/4	Reading 1: Unit 5 & 6
Week 5	10/11	Reading 1: Unit 7 & 8
Week 6	10/18	Reading 1: Unit 9 & 10
Week 7	10/25	Reading 1: Unit 11 & 12
Week 8	11/1	校慶
Week 9	11/8	期中測驗
Week 10	11/15	Reading 1: Unit 13 & 14
Week 11	11/22	Reading 1: Unit 15 & 16
Week 12	11/29	Reading 1: Unit 17 & 18
Week 13	12/6	Reading 1: Unit 19 & 20
Week 14	12/13	Reading 2: Unit 1 & 2
Week 15	12/20	Reading 2: Unit 3 & 4
Week 16	12/27	Reading2: Unit 5 & 6
Week 17	1/3	期末測驗
Week 18	1/10	英文會考
scorePolicy:
1.出席&上課表現：30％
                
2.期中測驗：30％

3.期末測驗：40％
materials: Casey Malarcher and Michael Pederson, Reading Challenge 1; Casey Malarcher and Andrea Janzen, Reading Challenge 2 (Compass, 2005)
